sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ContentService } from 'src/app/services/content.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content', templateUrl: './content.component.html', styleUrls: ['./content.component.css'] }) export class ContentComponent { cinema: any[] = []; constructor(private contentService: ContentService){} getCinema(): void{ this.contentService.getCinema().subscribe({ next: (data) => { console.log(data); this.cinema = data; }, error: (e) =>{ console.log(e); } }) } }
